package test;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner s = new Scanner(System.in);
		int a = s.nextInt();
		if(a%4 == 0 && (a%100 != 0 || a%400 == 0)) {
			System.out.println("1");
		}else {
			System.out.println("0");
		}
	}

}
